punk.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a type of loud music popular in the late 1970s and 1980s
punk.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: someone who likes punk music and wears things that are typical of it, such as torn clothes, metal chains, and coloured hair
punk.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a young man who fights and breaks the law
punk.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: a substance that burns without a flame that is used to light fireworks etc
